CustomField.description: Check to indicate whether the ST component of the token amount needs to be collected as part of booking process. If this is checked unless the entire token amount and service tax is paid, we cant proceed with the booking
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Check to indicate whether the ST component of the token amount needs to be collected as part of booking process. If this is checked unless the entire token amount and service tax is paid, we cant proceed with the booking
CustomField.label: Service Tax On Token Amount
